name: Reddit Sidebar Hover Toggle
description: This Style hides the Reddit Sidebar by default. The Sidebar can be brought up again by hovering over a small banner at the top right. This way, a lot of horizontal space is free for comments/content, especially on 4:3 monitors. As always with reddit styles, it is helpful to uncheck the option "Allow reddits to show me custom styles"" in the preferences (screenshot). But it should work fine with most custom reddit styles as well as userstles.
